album.title: The Very Best Of Sting And The Police

wiki.content:
"Every Little Thing She Does Is Magic" is a song by British rock group The Police from their studio album Ghost in the Machine. It was also a hit single that reached the top of the charts in the United Kingdom in November 1981 and hit number three on the U.S. Billboard Hot 100 chart that same year.
 
 Although released in 1981, Sting had written this song as early as 1976. A very early (1977) acoustic version of this song performed by him can be heard on the Strontium 90 album Strontium 90: Police Academy.
 
 Sting added this bit of "Every Little Thing..." lyrics to the end of "O My God" on the Police's 1983 release Synchronicity:
 
 "Do I have to tell the story
 Of a thousand rainy days
 Since we first met?
 It's a big enough umbrella
 But it's always me that ends up getting wet."
 
 These lyrics were later reused once more in Sting's "Seven Days" on his solo album Ten Summoner's Tales.
 
 The piano part was added by session keyboardist Jean Roussel who pestered the band to allow him to play on the track, against Andy Summers' original wishes.
 
 The song appears in the video game Karaoke Revolution Party, The Office episode entitled Phyllis' Wedding in Season 3 and in the 2005 film Bewitched.
 
 The song was referenced in the video game Warcraft II, where the cheat code "every little thing she does" instantly gives the player all magic-related upgrades.
        
User-contributed text is available under the Creative Commons By-SA License and may also be available under the GNU FDL.
wiki.summary: "Every Little Thing She Does Is Magic" is a song by British rock group The Police from their studio album Ghost in the Machine. It was also a hit single that reached the top of the charts in the United Kingdom in November 1981 and hit number three on the U.S. Billboard Hot 100 chart that same year.  Although released in 1981, Sting had written this song as early as 1976. A very early (1977) acoustic version of this song performed by him can be heard on the Strontium 90 album Strontium 90: Police Academy.

track.name: Every Little Thing She Does Is Magic
comments: "Everything little thing she does is magic..." This is pretty much how a guy feels about the girl he adores summed up neatly and artistically. :)
Had the Police posters on the wall during the day, sheet music and VHS videos too. A fan since album one.
Well, Everything she does is magic! Just great Lyrics,  Great track from The Police,  ♥
another brilliant classic from the police
classic
the best music of the police.
this song never gets old, love it! [2]
This song never gets old, love it!
This is pop genius.
pop brilliance
great  track...great group  sting  has  done  well...
Quite possibly one of the worst music videos ever made. So bad, it's good...
My absolute favourite Police-track!
great song ♥
Legendary!
It's strange; the longer I listen to Police songs the less and less I like this song. Or is that the more and more I like the other songs. I don't know.
love the Carribean vibe
this song is a put you in a good mood song... :)
Excellent!!
Sting is awesome. One of those singers that defines their band and makes it iconic.
